sig_info: Mascare’s fervor for the job grants him the following:
+10.03 to 18.61 Combat Power Rate while attacking.
+654.62 to 964.59 Critical Rating.

FAILED INCINERATE EFFECTS: Each time an Incinerate effect fails to apply due to an Immunity, the target instead takes a burst of 57.38 Energy Damage.
BASEBALL BAT ATTACKS: First, second and third Light Attack, as well as the first Medium and Heavy attack utilize the Baseball Bat.
BASEBALL BAT ATTACKS - WHILE BUILDING IG: +533.33 Block Penetration
Landing a Critical Hit, being Blocked, or striking an opponent that has an Incinerate Debuff grants 1 Ignition Charge for 20 seconds.
Critical Hits deal an additional 8.5% of damage dealt as a burst of Energy Damage for each Ignition Charge.
While Ignited, Masacre cannot gain Ignition Charges.
Upon reaching 10 Ignition Charges, all Charges are consumed and Mascare’s Bat becomes Ignited for 20 seconds.
BASEBALL BAT ATTACKS - WHILE IGNITED: +1066.67 Block Penetration
Gain Power when striking a Block as if landing a Hit.
This attack Incinerates the enemy, dealing 57.38 Energy Damage over 5 seconds. This effect also removes Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50% while it's active.
These Incinerate Debuffs gain +1 second(s) duration for each Incinerate on the opponent. Max: +5 Seconds.
WHEN BLOCKED: Opponent suffers -50% Ability Accuracy if they have at least 1 Debuff.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Each bat hit against an Incinerated Opponent, grants an additional Ignition Charge.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict a Disorient Debuff lasting 12 seconds and reducing Defensive Ability Accuracy and Block Proficiency by 50%. +200% Duration if the opponent doesn't have an Incinerate Debuff.
100% chance to refresh all active Incinerate Debuffs on the opponent.
Machete Hits have a 100% chance to inflict a Bleed Debuff, causing 63.75 direct damage over 20 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: If Masacre strikes into a Block, he will avoid incoming attacks for 1 seconds granting them a 100% chance to Miss.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: This attack Incinerates the enemy, dealing 255 Energy Damage over 5 seconds. This effect also removes Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50% while it's active.
